value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the new fuzzy match / merging option within the October 2018 version of Power BI Desktop. value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how the Power BI data region is selected. This is the what you see when you go to About Power BI and see "Your data is stored in". You should take care to make sure this is where the majority of users you are before anyone signs up for Office 365, Power BI or other Microsoft
